--- Darren Izzard <zysyshelp@...> wrote:
> I seem to remember a mention of something like this
> in terms of
> shape-recognition (albeit simpler) in a SANE paper,
> but I can't remember
> which one. As for game play, I've never heard of
> anyone trying it, but it
> certainly sounds like an interesting idea,
> especially applied to Go. 

Well, I guess Ken has. :)

--- Kenneth Stanley <kenstanley01@...> wrote:
> I should probably mention I've got such a system
> implemented
> right now in Go.  It's pretty interesting...it plays
> 5x5
> Go at least at a rudimentary level, even though it
> can't
> see the whole board at one time.  

How much can it see?  Are you letting the size of the
viewspace evolve, or is it fixed?

How are you handling the mobility of the viewspace
around the board?

Derek
